long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replicate your desktop navigation in real time on your mobile. Meeror is a simple solution for always keeping an eye on your mobile navigation, perfect for developers, integrators, and marketing professionals.

To do this, Meeror collects your browsing data and the cookies used on the current tab to replicate them on your mobile/tablet.
